import React, {useState,useContext} from 'react' import './booking.css' import { Form, FormGroup, ListGroup, ListGroupItem, Button } from 'reactstrap' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { AuthContext } from '../../context/AuthContext' const Booking = ({tour, avgRating}) => { const {price, reviews} = tour const navigate = useNavigate() const [credentials, setCredentials] = useState({ userId: '01', userEmail: 'example@gmail.com', fullName: '', phone: '', guestSize: 1, bookAt: '' }) const handleChange = e=> { setCredentials(prev=>({...prev, [e.target.id]:e.target.value})) } const serviceFee = 5 const totalAmount = Number(price) * Number(credentials.guestSize) + Number(serviceFee) const handleClick = e=>{ e.preventDefault() navigate('/thank-you') } return ( <>

${price} /per person

{avgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} ({reviews.length})
{/*==========Booking Form ============ */}
Information
{/*==========Booking Form ============ */} {/*==========Booking Bottom ============ */}
${price} 1 person
${price}
Service Charge
${serviceFee}
Total
${totalAmount}
) } export default Booking
